title: Demetri Kofinas on 'Financial Nihilism'
description: "People have increasingly lost faith in the models, frameworks, and moral codes that they grew up with," says the host of a popular podcast.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: "People have increasingly lost faith in the models, frameworks, and moral codes that they grew up with," says the host of a popular podcast.
